input.sentences: here we are parked at the start of the bike trip .
the bikers are mingling before the ride .
the countryside was beautiful with luscious green hills .
the bikers stopped near the road for a break .
we stopped at the side of the road near the forest .
output.sentences: My friends and I are going on a trip.
We're stopping off here for coffee before we continue.
The view up here is second to none.
We have to stop because it's so pretty here.
